TopicTitle: If you were the first person on Phobos/Demios, what would you say?

Articles.Content:
Like the other thread about mars, but this one with Phobos/Demios.

Id say: "Okay, what the heck is this rock doing here in the first place"?
On Phobos, "I can't see out of this huge freaking crater..."
Assuming there would be other astronauts there: "Dude, this is TOTALLY going on my facebook!"
As I stepped out of the lander, I would slowly and dramatically recite the full text of DOOM: Repercussions of Evil.
"Thats one small stone for a man, A huge stone for mankind"
this is it? ... aww...
Lol. Good ones!
I'm on a potato!

This really belongs in Off-Topic

Plus I'd say, "This place reminds me of the shores of hell"
"This place sucks!"

"That's one small hop for a man, and one giant suborbital leap for mankind."

Edited April 19, 2013 by TooManyErrors
Spaaaaaaccccccceeeeeeee!!!!!!!!!
"Nobody make any sudden movements, the escape velocity here is 5.6 m/s!"
Nine months, six days, three hours and two minutes. For this?
"So what did management want us to come here for?"

I CLAIM THIS PLANET IN THE NAME OF ME!!!!!!

Or

Looks like Bakersfield....
You do realize Phobos and Deimos are moons?
"Dude, there's no wi-fi here... Let's go back to earth".

You do realize Phobos and Deimos are moons?

Yes but after claiming them, I would re name them and label them as Planets. After all they would be mine.

Me: Uh, I thought we were landing on Mars.

Control: Just go with the script!

Me: Fine. The next giant leap for mankind has occurred. *plants american flag* Can I go home now?

Either that or:

"...Well, this sucks."
"You big planet, captured a so small asteroid ... HOW THE HELL DID YOU DO THAT ????"

One step for a foot,Im on a muther****ing moon of a big huge rock.

MC: JUST PLANT THE FLAG!

Whups,it flew out of my hands,its heading to mars.

Or...

Lets play golf!

*Plop*

*Lands on curiosity rover*

Nailed it!

Or...

*Flag flies to mars and lands*

One small mistake for me,one accidental epic thing by me.
"They know I was the first man on Mars right?"
Landing on Phobos: "Recalculating...recalculating...left turn ahead. You will have reached your destination in 5,9770 km. Have a nice day."
Um. Buzz. I think we're gonna have to get out and throw. Yeah, tinfoil will make for a good fuel tank substitute
